column4: Personally I use gftp. But only way to know what one likes is to test (apt-cache search ftp) and check what they are like via google (ie. linux x ftp clients). =)
fair enough :-) I could/will do the google search, but it's always useful to see what people recommend
I think this was for you too, but that tab got the one answering: <Madpilot> variant, Filezilla
haha........totally missed that. thanks! and thanks Madpilot Javid
